differences.text: COMING SOON... Seamless Luggage Handling For ultimate travel ease Our valet service will ship your bags directly from your door to your suite onboard or back home. Your luggage is picked up from your home or office and sent to your destination. This service ensures faster check-ins, smoother security clearance, and reduced risk of damage.
Consult Pre- and Post- Journey Additions Terms and Conditions here .

Air Travel Explora Journeys encourages guests to reserve early and take advantage of additional flight options and lower airfares. The Explora Journeys Air Travel programme may be reserved at any time prior to sailing. Any air reservations made after the journey’s final payment date will require full payment within 24 hours. All fares are quoted per adult in local currencies and include all government fees and taxes collected on an air ticket. Air fares will vary based on dates, classes of service, airline, and flight schedules. Airline cabin classes of service also vary based on dates, aircraft, and flight schedules and are subject to availability. The Explora Journeys Air Travel programme can be used in combination with the Explora Journeys Private Air Charters programme. Guests may choose to elect one programme at the beginning of their journey and the other upon the return, or vice versa. Once selections are made, any changes are subject to penalties imposed by the airlines and/or private aircraft operators. Air reservations are subject to cancellation if payment is not received within the designated schedule payment date on the journey confirmation. If air is reserved after the final payment date, full payment is due within 24 hours. Accrual of frequent flyer miles is at the discretion of the reserved airline. Flight schedules are verified by Explora Journeys at the time of ticketing. Explora Journeys strongly recommends that all guests reconfirm flights with the airline 96 hours prior to departure. Explora Journeys also recommends that guests provide airlines with a phone contact, email address, and/or text message information which may be used to notify the guest during travel in the event of a flight delay, boarding gate change, or another unexpected event. Private Air Charters The Explora Journeys Private Air Charters programme is only available for guests who have booked an Explora Journeys reservation with a full deposit. Full payment for the reservation must be made within 7 days of reservation when outside of the Journey final payment date. Penalty schedules are unique to the individual agreement of the charter operator and may result in penalties if cancelled prior to the final payment of the Explora Journeys reservation. The Explora Journeys Private Air Charters programme can be used in combination with The Explora Journeys Air Travel programme. Guests may choose to select one programme at the beginning of the journey and the other at the return, or vice versa. Once selections are made, any changes are subject to penalties imposed by the airlines or charter operators. Explora Journeys will not charge any service fees for changes or cancellations. Please note that aircraft availability, size, and cost as well as airport locations, and FBO services, vary greatly depending on destination, time of year, and the number of individuals traveling. Explora Journeys recommends reserving The Explora Journeys Private Air Charters programme as early as possible to maximise options and reduce costs. The Explora Journeys Private Air Charters programme may be reserved up to one year prior to departure. Service animals are allowed on private aircraft; however, some destinations may have restrictions on animals and require additional documentation. Please notify the Ambassador at the time of booking.

Terms & Conditions The Explora Journeys Private Air Services programme is accessible from specific city airports and covers all fuel surcharges and taxes. Prices are presented in local currencies and encompass all government and miscellaneous fees. Explora Journeys is not accountable for any supplementary fees imposed by individual vendors or governments for miscellaneous services, such as day-of-arrival visa cards, local gratuities, and more. All prices are subject to availability at the time of reservation and are not guaranteed until a fully signed private aircraft agreement is returned to Explora Journeys and full payment is received. Published fares require payment within 24 hours of reservation. Private (negotiated) fares must be settled no later than 150 days before sailing. If your departure is within 7 days, payment must be made within one hour of receiving the flight quote. Once a fully signed agreement is returned to Explora Journeys and full payment is received, this shall constitute the sole contract between the aircraft operator and the guest. The aircraft operator is responsible for any act or event that takes place while guests are on board its conveyances, or for those that occur while boarding or disembarking from the aircraft. Explora Journeys does not own or operate the aircraft, ground transportation or hotels, and is not liable in any way for loss, damage, injury, illness, or death arising in conjunction with the services provided by these independent contractors. Guests are solely responsible for all required documentation including valid passports, entry permits, visas, vaccinations or other local or governmental requirements. In accordance with governmental restrictions, the spelling of a guest’s name (first, middle, if any, and last) must be identical to the passport prior to issuing airline tickets. Contingent on the aircraft operators or local government restrictions, name changes, or name corrections, these actions may require the complete cancellation of the original reservation. This action may increase costs or result in the loss of the original schedule which is subject to availability at the time of the name correction. Private aircraft costs will vary based on dates, location, flight schedules and availability. Explora Journeys may provide private aircraft operators with passenger information, including full legal name, date of birth, nationality, residency status, and valid passport details, including issue and expiration dates. Any false, inaccurate, incomplete, or voluntarily altered data might lead to the cancellation of all air reservations, potentially resulting in the loss of the original booking. Private aircraft operators hold the authority to impose non-refundable fees or fare increases. Explora Journeys bears no responsibility for missing or inaccurate information, which may incur additional costs, modifications to the original reservation, or cancellations, placing the sole responsibility on the guest. Explora Journeys reserves the right to correct errors or omissions and to change fares, fees, promotions, and programmes at any time without notice.

Contact Us Book CONTACT US Call: + 41 43 508 64 78 Call: + 41 43 508 64 78 contact@explorajourneys.com Call me Request a quote Request brochure Pre- & Post-Journey Additions Homepage Pre- & Post-Journey Additions Pre- & Post-Journey Additions Our Explora Experience Ambassadors are always on hand to take care of any travel arrangements before and after your journey, including flights, accommodations, and transfers, ensuring a stress-free experience from beginning to end. Contact us to book Contact the Explora Experience Centre to book Contact the Explora Experience Centre to book your Pre- & Post-Journey Additions Contact the Explora Experience Centre to book your Pre- & Post-Journey Additions Contact Us Air Arrangements Allow us to ease you into your travel experience by taking care of all the essentials before and after your journey. From organising flights that align seamlessly with your itinerary to further enhancing the experience with curated hotel recommendations, our team is on hand to ensure every moment is made effortless. We can also make bespoke arrangements through our trusted private air carrier partners. Terms & Conditions apply . Air Arrangements Options Bespoke Air Travel Our Bespoke Air Travel offers personalised management of a wide selection of flights with the help of our dedicated team of specialised Explora Experience Ambassadors. ​ We partner with airlines worldwide to provide competitive fares. Our Bespoke Air Travel service includes flight protection, ensuring support during any flight disruptions.​ Private Air Charters Our Private Air Charters offer the height of customised travel with a choice of aircraft, departure times, dining options, and more. Reservations can be made with the help of our dedicated team of specialised Explora Experience Ambassadors. ​​ We provide access to a global network of trusted private charter partners with a selection of aircraft which can accommodate private individual parties of various sizes.​ Pre- & Post- Journey Hotel Stays Take the opportunity to delve deeper into a destination before or after your journey Our extensive partnerships with leading hoteliers around the globe mean we can arrange bespoke accommodation in and around our port destination cities for any duration. Terms & Conditions apply . Hotel Options Bespoke Hotel Arrangements For personalised pre- and post-journey planning, our Explora Experience Ambassadors are here to help, tailoring flexible hotel stays that offer convenience and great value. Equipped with advanced tools, our Ambassadors quickly create customized proposals tailored to your preferences and length of stay. Inclusions: - Hotel accommodation according to number of rooms and nights booked - Daily breakfast if booked by guest Note: Local fees or governmental taxes may not be included and should be paid locally by the guest. Exclusions: - Transfers from airport to hotel (pre journey hotel bookings) or from hotel to airport (post journey) - Shared transfer between hotel and pier or vice versa on embarkation / disembarkation days - Any other ground transfers and transportation or luggage handling - Porterage at the hotel Luxury Hotels & Transfers Explore your destination before or after your journey with our comprehensive hotel programme. Our Explora Experience Ambassadors arrange bespoke accommodations through our global partnerships with leading hoteliers. Enjoy excellent locations, ambiance, service, transfers and attention to detail. Additional benefits include a hospitality desk with a dedicated local host for tips, reservations, and assistance. Stays typically range from 1 to 3 nights, with options to extend. Inclusions: - Hotel accommodation according to number of rooms and nights booked. - Daily breakfast and porterage at the hotel (where applicable) - Local fees or governmental taxes - Private transfer for 2 guests including 2 pieces of checked luggage (total luggage) from airport to hotel (pre journey hotel bookings) or from hotel to airport (post journey). - Shared transfer: from hotel to pier on embarkation day (pre journey hotel bookings) or from pier to hotel on debarkation day (post journey hotel bookings) Note: Transfers included are limited to a distance of up to 50 miles / 80 kilometres. For any transfer arrangements exceeding the included distance, guests will be responsible for the payment of the additional costs. Exclusions: Guests are reponsible for any incidental charges incurred during their stay in the hotel such as additional nights, room upgrades, early check-in / late check-out, meals or other charges not included by Explora Journeys. Exclusive hotel benefit included in Owner's Residence - One complimentary pre or post journey hotel night for Owner’s Residence guests (where applicable, conditions apply ) Trusted Transfers Travel with total peace-of-mind, with tailor-made transfers Experience seamless travel with our worry-free transfers. We offer private transfers between the airport, pier, and hotel on embarkation and disembarkation days. You will be met and greeted by a local, knowledgeable, friendly team, ready to assist you for your arrival or departure. Upon request, we can also arrange group transfers, and provide vehicles for guests with special mobility needs. Terms & Conditions apply . Transportation Options Private Luxury Car Reserved for guests who prefer a superior, full-sized sedan with the utmost in comfort and legroom. Includes a driver who will assist with luggage between the airport and port or hotel, and vice versa, on days of either embarkation or disembarkation, or pre/post journey. Private Executive Car An elite mid-sized sedan with all the luxury, albeit slightly smaller in size. Includes a driver who will assist with luggage between the airport and port or hotel, and vice versa, on days of either embarkation or disembarkation, or pre/post journey. Private Car Mid-size vehicle that offers the best-available option in comfort, especially in destinations that are more remote. Includes a driver who will assist with luggage between the airport and port or hotel, and vice versa, on days of either embarkation or disembarkation, or pre/post journey. Private Executive Multi-Seater Vehicle Flagship, superior passenger van with luxurious leather seating for up to 6 guests. Includes a driver who will assist with luggage between the airport and port or hotel, and vice versa, on days of either embarkation or disembarkation, or pre/post journey. Private Executive SUV Elite SUV for guests who prefer to travel with plenty of style, luxury and legroom. Includes a driver who will assist with luggage between the airport and port or hotel, and vice versa, on days of either embarkation or disembarkation, or pre/post journey. Private Multi-Seater Vehicle An ideal transportation for groups requiring additional room, whether for comfort or extra luggage. This vehicle is the best-available choice for convenience and comfort, especially in destinations that are more remote. Includes a driver who will assist with luggage between the airport and port or hotel, and vice versa, on days of either embarkation or disembarkation, or pre/post journey. Shared Transfer Guests travelling as couples or solo passengers may choose a convenient and affordable shared transfer. The air-conditioned transport carries guests and their luggage between the airport and port, and vice versa, on days of either embarkation or disembarkation. Accessible Transfer Guests with limited mobility or those who may need a little extra assistance getting into and out of vehicles may wish to request transportation equipped with accessibility features. Day Hotel Access & Transfer When the airport arrival or departure is either well before or much later than embarkation or disembarkation time, we can arrange access to one of our signature hotels. This provides guests with a comfortable place to relax in the hotel lobby or restaurant. Luggage can be stored, allowing guests to explore the destination with ease. Day Hotel Stay & Transfer A long day with a late flight can be turned into a time of pure relaxation with the option of enjoying a day room at one of our signature hotel partners. A day room, or short-term hotel accommodation, is an excellent way to freshen up or a place to use as a base for exploring the destination at guests' leisure. Exclusive transfers benefits included in Ocean Residences - A Round trip transfer from / to the airport and hotel or from / to airport and hotel is included for a distance of up to 50 miles / 80 kilometres each way from selected airports is included for guests staying in Ocean Residence Suite Categories . Note : Transfers included are limited to a distance of up to 50 miles / 80 kilometres. For any transfer arrangements exceeding the included distance, guests will be responsible for the payment of the additional costs. Any additional cost will be communicated to guests at the time of booking and transportation will be confirmed once the extra cost is agreed and paid. Refunds will not be given for unused or partially used services. Exclusive transfers benefits included in Owner's Residence The following are included in Owner's Residences : - A round trip ground transfer home to airport is included for a distance of up to 50 miles / 80 kilometres from each way (where applicable). - A round trip transfer from / to the airport and hotel is included for a distance of up to 50 miles / 80 kilometres each way from selected airports. - A round trip transfer from/to hotel and pier is included for a distance of up to 50 miles / 80 kilometres each way. Note : Transfers included are limited to a distance of up to 50 miles / 80 kilometres. For any transfer arrangements exceeding the included distance, guests will be responsible for the payment of the additional costs. Any additional cost will be communicated to guests at the time of booking and transportation will be confirmed once the extra cost is agreed and paid. Refunds will not be given for unused or partially used services. Pre- & Post-Journey Immersions Immerse yourself deeper into the culture of the countries we visit with a series of immersive all-inclusive experiences Designed as single- or multi-day overland experiences, our Pre- & Post-Journey Immersions are all-inclusive and available to small groups starting before or after your journey. Simply relax and let us guide you into the extraordinary world waiting beyond. Our Pre- & Post-Journey Immersions transport you to new heights, whether by private jets, hot-air balloons, agile ATVs, or sturdy horses. Explore nearby wonders, from renowned landmarks to hidden gems, and embark on wilderness treks that are both well-known and steeped in mystery. Terms & Conditions apply . Discover Our Pre- & Post-Journey Immersions What to expect from Pre- & Post-Journey Immersions? - Luxury transportation such as private jet, helicopters, vehicles, boats or other - Accommodations in 5-star or boutique hotels - Culinary experiences, including all meals, beverages, and selected spirits - VIP access to landmark sites and special events - Ultra-exclusive evening experiences - Meticulously vetted hosts to coordinate all logistics - Luxury transfers and luggage handling COMING SOON... Seamless Luggage Handling For ultimate travel ease Our valet service will ship your bags directly from your door to your suite onboard or back home. Your luggage is picked up from your home or office and sent to your destination. This service ensures faster check-ins, smoother security clearance, and reduced risk of damage. Consult Pre- and Post- Journey Additions Terms and Conditions here . Contact Us Book CONTACT US Call: + 41 43 508 64 78 Call: + 41 43 508 64 78 contact@explorajourneys.com Call me Request a quote Request brochure Additional Information Air Arrangements Air Travel Explora Journeys encourages guests to reserve early and take advantage of additional flight options and lower airfares. The Explora Journeys Air Travel programme may be reserved at any time prior to sailing. Any air reservations made after the journey’s final payment date will require full payment within 24 hours. All fares are quoted per adult in local currencies and include all government fees and taxes collected on an air ticket. Air fares will vary based on dates, classes of service, airline, and flight schedules. Airline cabin classes of service also vary based on dates, aircraft, and flight schedules and are subject to availability. The Explora Journeys Air Travel programme can be used in combination with the Explora Journeys Private Air Charters programme. Guests may choose to elect one programme at the beginning of their journey and the other upon the return, or vice versa. Once selections are made, any changes are subject to penalties imposed by the airlines and/or private aircraft operators. Air reservations are subject to cancellation if payment is not received within the designated schedule payment date on the journey confirmation. If air is reserved after the final payment date, full payment is due within 24 hours. Accrual of frequent flyer miles is at the discretion of the reserved airline. Flight schedules are verified by Explora Journeys at the time of ticketing. Explora Journeys strongly recommends that all guests reconfirm flights with the airline 96 hours prior to departure. Explora Journeys also recommends that guests provide airlines with a phone contact, email address, and/or text message information which may be used to notify the guest during travel in the event of a flight delay, boarding gate change, or another unexpected event. Private Air Charters The Explora Journeys Private Air Charters programme is only available for guests who have booked an Explora Journeys reservation with a full deposit. Full payment for the reservation must be made within 7 days of reservation when outside of the Journey final payment date. Penalty schedules are unique to the individual agreement of the charter operator and may result in penalties if cancelled prior to the final payment of the Explora Journeys reservation. The Explora Journeys Private Air Charters programme can be used in combination with The Explora Journeys Air Travel programme. Guests may choose to select one programme at the beginning of the journey and the other at the return, or vice versa. Once selections are made, any changes are subject to penalties imposed by the airlines or charter operators. Explora Journeys will not charge any service fees for changes or cancellations. Please note that aircraft availability, size, and cost as well as airport locations, and FBO services, vary greatly depending on destination, time of year, and the number of individuals traveling. Explora Journeys recommends reserving The Explora Journeys Private Air Charters programme as early as possible to maximise options and reduce costs. The Explora Journeys Private Air Charters programme may be reserved up to one year prior to departure. Service animals are allowed on private aircraft; however, some destinations may have restrictions on animals and require additional documentation. Please notify the Ambassador at the time of booking. Terms & Conditions The Explora Journeys Private Air Services programme is accessible from specific city airports and covers all fuel surcharges and taxes. Prices are presented in local currencies and encompass all government and miscellaneous fees. Explora Journeys is not accountable for any supplementary fees imposed by individual vendors or governments for miscellaneous services, such as day-of-arrival visa cards, local gratuities, and more. All prices are subject to availability at the time of reservation and are not guaranteed until a fully signed private aircraft agreement is returned to Explora Journeys and full payment is received. Published fares require payment within 24 hours of reservation. Private (negotiated) fares must be settled no later than 150 days before sailing. If your departure is within 7 days, payment must be made within one hour of receiving the flight quote. Once a fully signed agreement is returned to Explora Journeys and full payment is received, this shall constitute the sole contract between the aircraft operator and the guest. The aircraft operator is responsible for any act or event that takes place while guests are on board its conveyances, or for those that occur while boarding or disembarking from the aircraft. Explora Journeys does not own or operate the aircraft, ground transportation or hotels, and is not liable in any way for loss, damage, injury, illness, or death arising in conjunction with the services provided by these independent contractors. Guests are solely responsible for all required documentation including valid passports, entry permits, visas, vaccinations or other local or governmental requirements. In accordance with governmental restrictions, the spelling of a guest’s name (first, middle, if any, and last) must be identical to the passport prior to issuing airline tickets. Contingent on the aircraft operators or local government restrictions, name changes, or name corrections, these actions may require the complete cancellation of the original reservation. This action may increase costs or result in the loss of the original schedule which is subject to availability at the time of the name correction. Private aircraft costs will vary based on dates, location, flight schedules and availability. Explora Journeys may provide private aircraft operators with passenger information, including full legal name, date of birth, nationality, residency status, and valid passport details, including issue and expiration dates. Any false, inaccurate, incomplete, or voluntarily altered data might lead to the cancellation of all air reservations, potentially resulting in the loss of the original booking. Private aircraft operators hold the authority to impose non-refundable fees or fare increases. Explora Journeys bears no responsibility for missing or inaccurate information, which may incur additional costs, modifications to the original reservation, or cancellations, placing the sole responsibility on the guest. Explora Journeys reserves the right to correct errors or omissions and to change fares, fees, promotions, and programmes at any time without notice. Three Enchanting Nights in Istanbul & Cappadocia Discover Ancient villages, hidden cities and timeless traditions. Overview What to Expect Begin in Istanbul, a city as enchanting as it is intriguing. Dine on authentic Ottoman cuisine before a restful night's sleep at the luxurious Hilton Istanbul . The next day, fly to Cappadocia to explore captivating caves, Byzantine frescoes and underground cities . Stay two nights at the one-of-a-kind Yunak Evleri cave hotel , before returning to Istanbul to board EXPLORA I. Day 1 Day 1 Arrive at Istanbul International Airport and, be accompanied to your hotel. Check in, then enjoy the freedom of exploration as you navigate this mesmerising city, from the vibrant flavours of the Grand Bazaar to the reverence of Hagia Sophia and the Blue Mosque . Admire the surrounding heritage before a sumptuous dinner in the heart of the Old City , a culinary exploration of authentic Ottoman cuisine. Day 2 Day 2 After breakfast, a transfer to the airport and flight to Cappadocia starts an unforgettable journey into Türkiye’s mystical heart . On arrival, marvel at Çavuşin village with its rock-cut dwellings and stone houses . Before a picturesque drive to Pigeon Valley and its Underground City, a settlement of 100 tunnels. Here, witness the intricacies of hand-weaving Turkish carpets before retreating to a unique cave hotel, Yunak Evleri. Carved into the mountainside, it dates back to the 5th and 6th centuries. A traditional dance show accompanies dinner and drinks in a local cave restaurant. Day 3 Day 3 As morning breaks, opt to soar high above Cappadocia’s spires and rock formations with the optional addition of a local hot-air balloon ride before returning to Yunak Evleri for breakfast. The rest of the day takes you to a Martian landscape in the Devrent (Imaginary) Valley , and the dreamlike ‘fairy chimneys’ of Paşabağ , carved by nature over thousands of years. In Avanos, visit a ceramic centre to see artisans in action and try your hand at pottery. Lunch is followed by a trip to UNESCO World Heritage Site, the Göreme Open-Air Museum , where Byzantine art ignites imagination. Day 4 Day 4 Awaken with a sense of gratitude for having delved more deeply into mystical, alluring Türkiye—and anticipation for the journey to come. After breakfast, check out and be transferred to the airport for a flight to Istanbul. On landing, a driver takes you to the port, drawing ever closer to your Ocean State of Mind as you embark on your ocean journey. Overview What to Expect From Casablanca, be transported to Marrakech, a captivating city of ancient and modern influence. Nicknamed the “Red City” after the clay used to construct many of its buildings, Marrakech intrigues the soul and the senses. Surround yourself with iconic sights, uplifting sounds, and vibrant flavours from the comfort of a five-star hotel within the old Medina, a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Day 1 Day 1 From Casablanca pier, be seamlessly transferred to Marrakech and accompanied to your hotel. Together, explore some of the most profound places in the Medina from the 12th-century Koutoubia Mosque , the city's largest mosque, to its gardens. Refuel at a local restaurant, savouring an authentic Moroccan lunch. Relax and refresh before a short drive to the city's fames Medina . On foot, explore its alleyways, pausing to marvel at the colours, sounds, and aromas. Wind through the souks before enjoying a mouthwatering dinner at a local restaurant, taking the opportunity to understand Marrakech’s culinary culture . Day 2 Day 2 Breakfast beckons dishes to fuel the day ahead. Afterwards begin a tour of Marrakech's monuments and marvels. The adventure begins with a drive to Bahia Palace , a 19th-century masterpiece of Moroccan architecture. Continue onwards to the revered Ben Youssef Medersa , a treasure nestled in the heart of the ancient Medina. Admire its magnificent interior and catch a glimpse of life for the students who lived and learned within its walls. Enjoy free time to explore Djemaa el-Fna once again, and with appetites awakened, a relaxing lunch precedes the drive back to Casablanca, pausing for a photo at the Hassan II Mosque. Then, it's back to the ship, to reconnect with your Ocean State of Mind and continue your luxury ocean journey. Contact Us Book CONTACT US Call: + 41 43 508 64 78 Call: + 41 43 508 64 78 contact@explorajourneys.com Call me Request a quote Request brochure NEWS MEDIA CONTACTS July 2024 Explora Journeys Announces New Art Collection And Immersive Art Experiences On Board EXPLORA I Explora Journeys Download Share Share Geneva, Switzerland, 15 July 2024 – Explora Journeys, the luxury lifestyle ocean travel brand of the MSC Group, is delighted to unveil a newly curated art collection and immersive art experiences on board EXPLORA I, including a collection of rare limited-edition screenprints and lithographs by Andy Warhol and Roy Lichtenstein as well as an original acrylic and silkscreen on canvas by Andy Warhol. This new exhibition perfectly complements the permanent art collection of fine art and sculptures, offering an inspiring and immersive journey for guests on board. Curated Artistry: A Serene State of Mind Every piece of the permanent art collection on board EXPLORA I has been meticulously chosen by the owner’s family to embody this serene state, providing guests with an immersive art experience. The art selection on board the ship features a blend of renowned and emerging artists, alongside master artisans, enhancing every space from suites to restaurants, passing areas, lounges, and the lobby. Guests can find commissioned limited edition prints in the suites and corridors, while abstract three-dimensional paper wall reliefs and specially commissioned paintings adorn the restaurants. These artworks showcase the owner's family's commitment to aesthetics and elevating the onboard experience. Sculptural masterpieces by Yves Dana in the lobby serve as focal point, seamlessly integrating with the ship’s unique design. For the public areas on deck five, Explora Journeys has acquired Yinka Shonibare’s extraordinary and important British Library collections (Philanthropists, 2021; Activists, 2021; Actors, 2020; Female Artists, 2020; Writers, 2019). British-Nigerian artist Yinka Shonibare CBE exhibits his work across the globe and currently has pieces in (among others) the Tate, the Victoria and Albert Museum in London, MOMA in New York, the Perez Art Museum Miami, the National Museum of African Art at the Smithsonian in Washington DC and Moderna Museet in Stockholm. Koray Savas, Vice President Hotel Operations Explora Journeys said, “Art has always been one of the main focal points of the guest experience on board our ships. The carefully curated art selection features a blend of renowned and emerging artists, alongside master artisans, creating an immersive art experience for guests throughout their journey. From the suites to the restaurants, and from the public areas to the lounges and lobby, the artworks enhance every space, ensuring that each guest’s experience is enriched with beauty and inspiration.” Iconic Pop Art at the Galleria d’Arte on board EXPLORA I Galleria d’Arte now features a privately-owned collection of limited-edition prints from two legendary pop art masters: Andy Warhol and Roy Lichtenstein. Guests will have the unique opportunity to view some of the most iconic and influential works by these world-renowned artists. Furthermore, expert art luminaries and hosts will be able to guide guests through these legendary artworks, elevating the art experience on board. The installation debuted on 19 June 2024 in Barcelona, Spain, and will remain on board until spring 2025. Pop Art exhibition highlights: Roy Lichtenstein 1. Brushstroke, 1965 (Screenprint on heavy, white wove paper) 2. I Love Liberty, 1982 (Screenprint on heavy, white wove paper) 3. Bull Profile Series, 1973 – 6 Prints (Complete portfolio of 6 lithographs, with screenprint and line-cut on Arjomari paper) 4. Blue Floor, 1990 (Lithograph, woodcut and screenprint on paper technologies, inc. museum board) 5. As I Opened Fire, 1966 (3 offset lithographs in colour on wove paper) Andy Warhol Campbell’s Soup I, 1968 - 8 Prints (Screenprint in colour on paper) Black Bean Tomato Onion made with Beef Stock Beef with Vegetables and Barley Green Pea Pepper Pot Consomme (beef) gelatin added Cream of Mushroom Campbell’s Soup II, 1969 – 3 Prints (Screenprint in colour on paper) Old Fashioned Vegetable Made with Beef Stock Tomato Beef Noodle O's Cheddar Cheese Superman, 1981 (Screenprint on Lenox Museum Board) Apple, 1985 (Screenprint on Lenox Museum Board) Moonwalk, 1987 (Screenprint on Lenox Museum Board) Campbell's Soup Box: Chicken Rice, 1986 (Acrylic and silkscreen on canvas) Related Posts 21 August 2025 EXPLORA JOURNEYS ANNOUNCES JANNIK SINNER AS GLOBAL BRAND AMBASSADOR Explora Journeys, the luxury lifestyle ocean travel brand of the MSC Group, is delighted to announce its partnership with world-renowned tennis champion Jannik Sinner, who will serve as the brand’s new ambassador.
